Ahmad Saroya

Hi im currently an undergraduate Maths and Computer science student at Oxford

Projects

  • Plaribus Poker AI: Recreated the worlds strongest Ai poker bot, capable of beating the worlds strongest players at 6 player poker . I used an amazon EC2 machine with 128 cores and 512GB of RAM, to train and test the AI in real poker games. I used Python to write the code for the Poker AI .
  • Web/App Development: Created a large number of apps, including a AI companionship app, which provided users with an immersive experiance where they could speak to and create any fictional character.Through projects like this I have become very experianced with dealing with ai models from LLM's to image generation. In addition to growing skilled at building larger, more intricate applications.
  • Game Development: I have many years of experiance in game development, where I have published and developed a large variety of games.Ive created From large scale open-world survival games, to cozy,aesthetic, experiance based games.

Work Experience

  • GCHQ internship - Trained a Neural network to summarise incoming threats into a few words, and classify them into one of 72 catogories. During the internship I was introduced to a variety of new concepts, such as Jaccard Distance, MLP's and Word embeddings to name a few.
  • J.P. Morgan Internship - I worked as a summer Intern in the Asset Management Line of Business at JPM, where I gained a insight into the how asset managment actually works.

Notable Achievements

  • Math Competitions Champion: Placed in the top 0.0014% in the UKMT Senior Maths Challenge, invited to British Mathematics Olympiad and UKMT National Math Summer School.
  • National Charity Ambassador: Created a local charity for disadvantaged students, later partnering with the Social Mobility Foundation as an ambassador.
  • Debate Club Founder and Leader: Started a school debate club, led team to third place nationally, and grew membership to over half the student body.

About Me

I'm an aspiring stand- up comedian, who enjoys reading books.
